location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP SHOWING PROPOSALS FOR PARTIAL RECLAMATION OF THE MARSHS'

mods.abstract: The map shows the estuary of the Euphrates and Old Euphrates. The map also indicates hydrology and settlements (Nasria, Elua, Basrah, Mohammera, Fao) with brief descriptions of topography, vegetation such as date gardens, and the residence of a notable sheikh. Water levels are indicated by detailed numbering.The map was printed by the Simla Drawing Office and includes a printing statement which reads 'S.D.O. No. 1373 September, 1915'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
